languages.text: {n}Маражай брезгливо взирает на звероподобного великана.{/n} "Заразу ущербности? Весь трагизм и комизм существования вашей расы запечатлились в двух словах".
{n}Marazhai stares at him in disgust.{/n} "Blight of degeneracy, you say? Those words aptly encompass both the tragedy and the comedy of your kind's existence."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай брезгливо взирает на звероподобного великана.{/n} "Заразу ущербности? Весь трагизм и комизм существования вашей расы запечатлились в двух словах".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai l'observe avec dégoût.{/n} « Dégénérescence, vous dites ? Ce mot résume assez bien la tragicomédie qu'est l'existence de votre espèce. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at him in disgust.{/n} "Blight of degeneracy, you say? Those words aptly encompass both the tragedy and the comedy of your kind's existence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai l'observe avec dégoût.{/n} « Dégénérescence, vous dites ? Ce mot résume assez bien la tragicomédie qu'est l'existence de votre espèce. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋不满地瞪了乌尔法一眼。{/n}“你是说‘思想堕落’吗？这个词倒是恰如其分地概括了你们这个种族的缺点与优点。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at him in disgust.{/n} "Blight of degeneracy, you say? Those words aptly encompass both the tragedy and the comedy of your kind's existence."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋不满地瞪了乌尔法一眼。{/n}“你是说‘思想堕落’吗？这个词倒是恰如其分地概括了你们这个种族的的缺点与优点。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは呆れたように彼を見つめた。{/n}「堕落の病と言ったか？その言葉は、お前たちの存在の悲しさと滑稽さの両方を見事に言い表しているな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at him in disgust.{/n} "Blight of degeneracy, you say? Those words aptly encompass both the tragedy and the comedy of your kind's existence."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは呆れたように彼を見つめた。{/n}「堕落の病と言ったか？その言葉は、お前たちの存在の悲しさと滑稽さの両方を見事に言い表しているな」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai starrt ihn angewidert an.{/n} "Seuche der Verkommenheit, sagt Ihr? In diesen Worten liegt sowohl die Tragik als auch die Komik Eurer Existenz."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at him in disgust.{/n} "Blight of degeneracy, you say? Those words aptly encompass both the tragedy and the comedy of your kind's existence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt ihn angewidert an.{/n} "Seuche der Verkommenheit, sagt Ihr? In diesen Worten liegt sowohl die Tragik als auch die Komik Eurer Existenz."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai le mira con desprecio.{/n} «¿Plaga de degeneración, dices? Esas palabras resumen con bastante precisión la tragicomedia que es la existencia de tu especie».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at him in disgust.{/n} "Blight of degeneracy, you say? Those words aptly encompass both the tragedy and the comedy of your kind's existence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai le mira con desprecio.{/n} «¿Plaga de degeneración, dices? Esas palabras resumen con bastante precisión la tragicomedia que es la existencia de tu especie».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, adama iğrenerek bakıyor.{/n} "Soysuzluk illeti demek? Bana kalırsa bu kelimeler tam da türünüzün varlığının trajikomikliğini anlatıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at him in disgust.{/n} "Blight of degeneracy, you say? Those words aptly encompass both the tragedy and the comedy of your kind's existence."
